item.title: 4th and Goal
item.description: I am using data from the nflscrapR package to investigate offensive success on goal to go situations on different downs. I will perform exploratory data analysis and modeling on regular season game data from 2009-2018, and test the performance on 2019 regular season data. Section 1. Initial Analysis Figure 1. If we define success as a play with a positive value for excepted points added (epa), we can see a nice split in good/bad distribution for 3rd and 4th down.

item.title: About
item.description: About I live in Freeport Maine. I enjoy the outdoors, as well as using data and information to make decisions under uncertainty. School I am formally educated in statistics, business and economics.
